name: Pong 3000
description:
You think you've mastered Pong? 

------------

F O O L S

------------

Pong 3000 takes the classic to a whole new level.

-Master moving around planets in TWO DIMENSIONS

-Hurt your friends in the only way that means anything, MULTIPLAYER

-This is the future of gaming, fresh out of the year 199X

CONTROLS

--------------

Player 1 - W,A,D

Player 2 - Arrow Keys

Pause - ESC

Restart - ENTER
